text: Nena, “Oh inu anthu! Ndithudi ine ndatumizidwa ngati Mtumwi wa Mulungu kwa inu nonse, yemwe ali Mwini ufumu wakumwamba ndi wa padziko lapansi. Kulibe mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Iye amapereka moyo ndi imfa. Motero khulupilirani mwa Mulungu ndi mwa Mtumwi wake, Mtumwi yemwe sadziwa kuwerenga ndi kulemba, amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi m’Mawu ake. Ndipo mutsatireni iye kuti mukhale otsogozedwa.”
